p: Behavioural assessments to evaluate the motor, exploratory, locomotory, and neuromuscular changes associated with the treatments were conducted 24 h after the last dosage was administered. Open field assessment was used to determine the total distance travelled, total time spent, body angle turn, and average speed as analysed by video tracking software (EthoWatcher). Fore limb grip test, and negative geotaxis using the methods documented by Farombi et al. [ 16].
